description: Close-up of the cipher stall — koi-like holographic glyphs over cyan barbed-wire filigree, glitch red ticker streaming fragment IDs, rain-beaded carbon panels, and a single lore fragment chip glowing in focus.

file.alt_text: WIRED CHAOS Red Light District — cipher stall macro with glowing lore fragment chip and neon cyan filigree
